projects.title: XSS Automation Tool
projects.description: An advanced tool for identifying and exploiting XSS vulnerabilities in web applications.
projects.longDescription: This tool helps hackers identify and exploit cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in web applications.

projects.title: QuickDir PowerShell
projects.description: A powerful directory management tool that creates and manages custom directory shortcuts for efficient navigation in PowerShell sessions.
projects.longDescription: Simplifies PowerShell navigation by allowing users to create and manage directory shortcuts. Features include alias creation, persistent storage, and tab completion.
